content:
Units of the Defense Forces stopped two attempts to infiltrate enemy sabotage and reconnaissance groups in the Sumy region.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on its Facebook page.

The sabotage groups were neutralized in the areas of old Guta and bars.

It is also reported that the enemy has struck aviation in areas of settlements Velika Pisarivka, Old Huta, Ryzhivka, Popivka, Yamne, Oleksandrivka, Lugovka of Sumy region.

FordataThe General Staff of the Armed Forces, in the Seversky and Slobozhansky directions, the enemy retains military presence in border areas, conducts sabotage and intelligence activities, carries out shelling of settlements from the territory of the Russian Federation, increases the density of mine-explosive barriers along the state border of Ukraine.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 13, the Defense ForceBrokeThe reconnaissance mission of the Russians who tried to swim on the Dnieper boat and land on the right bank in the area of the Antonivsky Bridge in Kherson.
title: Defense forces neutralized two Russian DRGs in Sumy region
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on its Facebook page. Sabotage ...
author: Army Inform
